value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Das ultimativ beste Thema aller Zeiten überhaupt!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Die Stunde der Wahrheit!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Mal ehrlich... Da gibt's nur eine richtige Wahl.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Unbeschwert, heiter... Das bin ich!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Bitte lasst nicht zu, dass ihr Ego weiter anschwillt!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gelassen, gefasst und gewitzt Ewählt Limone!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Jetzt ist es also so weit...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Team Aioli wird bei diesem Splatfest übelst abfeiern!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: „Übelst abfeiern E Da wird einem ja echt übel.

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Die beste Medizin: Für Team Limone stimmen!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Stimmen einzusacken ist nur der halbe Kampf!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Die andere Hälfte des Kampfes ist... Kampf!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Und was denken unsere Zuschauer? Stimmt ab!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Wer abstimmt, kriegt ein Splatfest-Shirt!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: They finally did it... The ultimate Splatfest theme!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Oh, it''s sooooo on!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Guys, you know there's only one real choice here.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Happy-go-lucky, carefree... Callie! That's me!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Guys, you don't want to swell her head any more!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Pick me! Cool, calm and collected - vote Marie!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: So it's finally come down to this.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sorry, but Team Callie are about to BRING THE PAIN!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: You'll 'bring the pain'? Did you seriously say that?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: This is why people are gonna vote Team Marie!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Well getting votes is only half the battle!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: The other half of the battle is...battling!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: So, who will it be? Be sure to cast your vote!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: After you've voted, you'll get a Splatfest Tee!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Tenía que pasar... ¡Llega la madre de todos los temas!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: ¿Madre...? Madre... ¡Madre mía! ¿Va en serio?

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sí, pero no habrá discusión. La gente me adora a mí.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Mar: una chica espontánea y divertida. ¡Esa soy yo!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Creo que vas demasiado sobrada. ¡Me votarán a mí!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Calmada, seria y fiable. Así es vuestra amiga Tina.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Por fin el duelo que todos estábamos esperando.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ya es hora de demostrar que mi equipo es el mejor.

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Espero que no lo estés diciendo en serio...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: La gente con buen criterio me votará a mí, sin duda.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: De todas formas, ¡no solo cuentan los votos!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Lo más importante es... ¡hacerlo bien en combate!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ahora os toca uniros a uno de los dos bandos.

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Elegid una opción y llevaos vuestra camiseta festiva.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ça alors, j'y crois pas ! Ils l'ont fait !!!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Le thème suprême, le choix ultime, l'heure de vérité...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Bon, eh ben, je sens que ça va être vite plié !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Insouciante, pétillante et décontract', votez AYO !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Si vous faites ça, c'est la grosse tête assurée...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Mauvaise idée ! Réfléchie, cool et posée, votez OLY !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Pas la peine d'en dire plus, laissons les fans décider !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Prête pour la dérouillée de ta vie, Oly ?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Ha ha ha, mais c'est qu'elle y croit, en plus !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Nos fans vont voter Oly rien que pour te calmer...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sauf que les votes, ça fait pas tout, j'te signale !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Faut aussi assurer sur le champ de bataille !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: À vous, les amis ! Pensez bien à voter, surtout !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Comme ça, vous recevrez votre t-shirt festif !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: La domanda delle domande! Lo scontro decisivo!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Incredibile!!!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Tanto lo sapete che c'è una sola risposta possibile!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Allegra, spensierata... Votate per me, Stella!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Ragazzi, così si monterà la testa ancora di più...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Scegliete me! Calma e tranquilla... Votate Marina!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sapevo che questo giorno sarebbe arrivato.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Mi spiace, ma la squadra di Stella... SPACCA!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Spacca? Ho sentito bene? Ma come parli?!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: ÁEproprio per questo che voteranno per me.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Beh, ottenere i voti è solo metà della battaglia!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: L'altra metà della battaglia è... beh, la battaglia!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: E VOI fan, cosa ne dite? Non dimenticate di votare!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Dopo il voto, riceverete una bella t-shirt festival!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: They finally did it... The ultimate Splatfest theme!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Oh, it''s sooooo on!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Guys, you know there's only one real choice here.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Happy-go-lucky, carefree... Callie! That's me!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Guys, you don't want to swell her head any more!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Pick me! Cool, calm and collected - vote Marie!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: So it's finally come down to this.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sorry, but Team Callie are about to BRING THE PAIN!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: You'll 'bring the pain'? Did you seriously say that?

value.Speaker: Right

value.Speaker: Left

value.Speaker: Left

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Ha ha ha, mais c'est qu'elle y croit, en plus !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Nos fans vont voter Oly rien que pour te calmer...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Sauf que les votes, ça fait pas tout, j'te signale !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Faut aussi assurer sur le champ de bataille !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: À vous, les amis ! Pensez bien à voter, surtout !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Comme ça, vous recevrez votre t-shirt festif !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Aioli oder Limone?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Stimmt vor der Lobby am Wahlstand ab!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Callie (yay!) or Marie (boo!)?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vote in front of the Lobby and get battling!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¿Cuál de nosotras os cae mejor? ¿Mar o Tina?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Podéis elegir equipo junto a la entrada del vestíbulo.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Alors, « Ayo-ouaaais » ou « Oly-bouuuh » ?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Tous à l'urne festive ! Elle est au pied de la tour !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Stella o Marina?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Votate davanti alla lobby e preparatevi alla lotta!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Callie (yay!) or Marie (boo!)?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vote in front of the Lobby and get battling!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Callie (yay!) or Marie (boo!)?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vote in front of the Lobby and get battling!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: シオカラーズ国民投票フェス、 始まってるよー！

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: ロビー前から投票して、 参加しよ～

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Callie (yay!) or Marie (boo!)?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vote in front of the Lobby and get battling!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¿Cuál de nosotras os cae mejor? ¿Mar o Tina?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Podéis elegir equipo junto a la entrada del vestíbulo.

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Alors, « Ayo-ouaaais » ou « Oly-bouuuh » ?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Tous à l'urne festive ! Elle est au pied de la tour !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ätsch! Das beste Team hat gewonnen!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Immerhin bist du eine gute Gewinnerin...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ai-o-li, Ai-o-li, Ai-o-li! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Keine Angst, Limone-Fans! Ich hab euch noch lieb!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Wie immer gilt: Preise abholen nicht vergessen!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Das war's von uns!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: YES! In your face! The best team wins!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: At least you're a gracious winner...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Cal-lie, Cal-lie, Cal-lie! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Marie fans! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: No ha habido sorpresas. ¡Yo gano y tú pierdes!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: No me lo restriegues...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¿A quién hay que animar? ¡Mar! ¡Mar! ¡Mar! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Gracias por vuestro apoyo a pesar de la derrota...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¡Recoged vuestros premios en la plaza, como siempre!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Y recibid un saludo de las Calamarciñas. ¡Nos vemos!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Et VLAN, dans les dents ! On vous a LA-MI-NÉS !!!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: T'as toujours la victoire modeste, à ce que je vois !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: La-mi-nés, la-mi-nés ! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ça ne fait rien, l'équipe Oly, vous êtes tous super !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: En tout cas, avis à tous les participants...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: N'oubliez pas de récupérer vos prix sur la place !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Evviva! Ha vinto la migliore! Beccati questo!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Non sai vincere con classe, tsk...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Stel-la! Stel-la! Stel-la! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Non preoccupatevi, miei cari fan... vi amo lo stesso!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: A proposito, in piazza vi aspettano i vostri premi.

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Continuate a fare il tifo per noi, mi raccomando!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: YES! In your face! The best team wins!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: At least you're a gracious winner...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Cal-lie, Cal-lie, Cal-lie! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Marie fans! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: YES! In your face! The best team wins!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: At least you're a gracious winner...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Cal-lie, Cal-lie, Cal-lie! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Marie fans! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: アオリチーーーム！！

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: アオリチームﾉみんな、 ありがとー！！

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ホタルチームﾓ がんばったんだけどな～

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: さて それでは、フェスﾆ参加した人ﾊ 広場ﾃ スーパーサザエ もらってね！

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: これからも シオカラーズｦ応援よろ～

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: YES! In your face! The best team wins!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: At least you're a gracious winner...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Cal-lie, Cal-lie, Cal-lie! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Marie fans! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: No ha habido sorpresas. ¡Yo gano y tú pierdes!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: No me lo restriegues...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¿A quién hay que animar? ¡Mar! ¡Mar! ¡Mar! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Gracias por vuestro apoyo a pesar de la derrota...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¡Recoged vuestros premios en la plaza, como siempre!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Y recibid un saludo de las Calamarciñas. ¡Nos vemos!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Et VLAN, dans les dents ! On vous a LA-MI-NÉS !!!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: T'as toujours la victoire modeste, à ce que je vois !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: La-mi-nés, la-mi-nés ! ♪

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ça ne fait rien, l'équipe Oly, vous êtes tous super !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: En tout cas, avis à tous les participants...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: N'oubliez pas de récupérer vos prix sur la place !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: War ja klar, dass Team Limone sich den Sieg holt!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Das kriege ich bis in alle Ewigkeit zu hören, oder?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gut gemacht! Ihr seid fantastische Fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Ich hab euch trotzdem lieb, Team Aioli!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Wie immer gilt: Preise abholen nicht vergessen!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Das war's von uns!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gosh, Team Marie takes it down! I knew we'd do it!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: I'm never gonna hear the last of this, am I?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Great effort, my little Marie fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Team Callie! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: ¡Ostras! ¡Hemos ganado! ¡Mi equipo ha vencido!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Bah, tampoco es para darle tanta importancia, Tina...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gracias por vuestro apoyo. ¡Estoy contentísima!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Tampoco voy a perder mi optimismo solo por esto...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¡Recoged vuestros premios en la plaza, como siempre!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Y recibid un saludo de las Calamarciñas. ¡Nos vemos!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Je t'avais prévenue, Ayo ! Tu étais trop sûre de toi !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Argh, c'est parti pour la leçon de morale...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vous avez été sublimes, mes petits fans adorés !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Vous aussi, l'équipe Ayo ! Chapeau à tous !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: En tout cas, avis à tous les participants...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: N'oubliez pas de récupérer vos prix sur la place !

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Evviva, abbiamo vinto! Ne ero sicura!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Te lo sentirò ripetere per mesi e mesi...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Ottimo lavoro, amici miei!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Non importa, cari fan. Vi voglio bene lo stesso!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: A proposito, in piazza vi aspettano i vostri premi.

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Continuate a fare il tifo per noi, mi raccomando!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gosh, Team Marie takes it down! I knew we'd do it!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: I'm never gonna hear the last of this, am I?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Great effort, my little Marie fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Team Callie! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gosh, Team Marie takes it down! I knew we'd do it!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: I'm never gonna hear the last of this, am I?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Great effort, my little Marie fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Team Callie! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gosh, Team Marie takes it down! I knew we'd do it!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: I'm never gonna hear the last of this, am I?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Great effort, my little Marie fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Team Callie! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gosh, Team Marie takes it down! I knew we'd do it!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: I'm never gonna hear the last of this, am I?

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Great effort, my little Marie fans!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Don't worry, Team Callie! I still love you all!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Anyway, don't forget to grab your prizes as usual!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: That's it from us. Squid Sisters out!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: ¡Ostras! ¡Hemos ganado! ¡Mi equipo ha vencido!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Bah, tampoco es para darle tanta importancia, Tina...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Gracias por vuestro apoyo. ¡Estoy contentísima!

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Tampoco voy a perder mi optimismo solo por esto...

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: ¡Recoged vuestros premios en la plaza, como siempre!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Y recibid un saludo de las Calamarciñas. ¡Nos vemos!

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Je t'avais prévenue, Ayo ! Tu étais trop sûre de toi !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Argh, c'est parti pour la leçon de morale...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: Vous avez été sublimes, mes petits fans adorés !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: Vous aussi, l'équipe Ayo ! Chapeau à tous !

value.Speaker: Left
value.Text: En tout cas, avis à tous les participants...

value.Speaker: Right
value.Text: N'oubliez pas de récupérer vos prix sur la place !
